manifest.description_for_model: Monitor websites, email servers, check dns resolution, ping services and check for quantum safe encryption. The user can view and query hosts stored in the api database. If a user wants to add a host then they need to supply an email address. This will allow them to receive alerts when the host they add is down. When a user adds a host with theie email address they are given an EditAuthKey this can be used in future sessions to authenticate the user.
manifest.description_for_human: Monitor websites, email servers, check dns resolution, ping services and check for quantum safe encryption.
